evidence.claim: Grayduck Health uses AWS for cloud infrastructure.
They implement FHIR standards for patient data exchange.
EDI and X12 transaction sets are utilized by Grayduck Health for insurance claims.
Grayduck Health integrates with various EHR systems for seamless data interoperability.
The company employs Google Cloud services for data storage and processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data interchange and operates in X12 environments.
matched_use_cases: Data exchange between providers and payers
